titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding the settlement of claims of citizens of the United States against the Government of Germany with respect to the deaths of members of the United States Air Force resulting from the collision off the coast of Namibia of a German Luftwaffe aircraft with a United States Air Force aircraft on September 13, 1997.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: 5/19/1999--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the German Government should promptly agree to a fair settlement with, and promptly make payments under that settlement to, the families of the members of the U.S. Air Force killed in a collision between a U.S. Air Force C-141 Starlifter aircraft and a German Luftwaffe Tupelov TU-154M aircraft off the coast of Namibia on September 13, 1997.
